definitions.definition: A device for measuring the revolutions per minute ( RPMs ) of a revolving shaft, as with the driveshaft of an automobile.
A device for measuring or indicating velocity or speed, as of blood, a river, a machine, etc.

main_definition: A device for measuring the revolutions per minute ( RPMs ) of a revolving shaft, as with the driveshaft of an automobile.
secondary_definitions: A device for measuring or indicating velocity or speed, as of blood, a river, a machine, etc.
